items.question: What is Alium and what does it do?
items.answer: Alium is a comprehensive platform designed to streamline your project lifecycle from idea to launch. It offers tools for collaboration, development, and deployment, all in one place.

items.question: How does the free trial work?
items.answer: Our 14-day free trial gives you full access to all features on our Pro plan. No credit card is required to start. At the end of the trial, you can choose a plan or move to our free plan.

items.question: Can I integrate Alium with other tools?
items.answer: Yes! Alium supports hundreds of integrations with popular tools like Slack, GitHub, Jira, and more. You can connect your favorite apps to create a seamless workflow.
